attributes.action: University should be FREE for everyone
attributes.additional_details:
In all fairness, I think that university should be free for everyone. This means that anyone can go there to learn, not matter what class, ethnicity or race you are. Everyone should have an equal chance to go as well as to have many opportunities to help them grow and expand their knowledge.

£3.5bn to subsidise everyone.
£33bn on the war in afghanistan yearly
You do the maths.

The government must have enough money to fund this. Education is supposed to be important! WE ARE YOUR FUTURE!
